banner.title: CK Better Cheats Menu
general.mod-enabled.label: Mod Enabled
general.enable-notifications.label: Enable Notifications
general.enable-notifications.tooltip: Show HUD notification messages when cheats are applied. Disabled by default.
general.hotkey-hint: Press the menu hotkey (default: K) to open this menu at any time. Configure the hotkey in config.json.
player.speed-multiplier.label: Speed Multiplier
player.speed-bonus.label: Speed Bonus
player.speed-bonus.tooltip: Flat speed bonus added to base movement.
player.no-clip.label: No Clip
player.no-clip.tooltip: Walk through walls, buildings, and all obstacles.
player.infinite-stamina.label: Infinite Stamina/Energy
player.infinite-stamina.tooltip: Never get tired. Stamina always stays at max.
player.infinite-health.label: Infinite Health
player.max-stamina-override.label: Max Stamina/Energy Override
player.max-health-override.label: Max Health Override
player.stamina-regen.label: Stamina Regen / Sec
player.stamina-regen.tooltip: How much stamina regenerates every second. 0 = none.
player.health-regen.label: Health Regen / Sec
player.health-regen.tooltip: How much health regenerates every second. 0 = none.
combat.one-hit-kill.label: One Hit Kill
combat.one-hit-kill.tooltip: All enemies die in one hit.
combat.always-crit.label: 100% Critical Chance
combat.damage-multiplier.label: Damage Multiplier
combat.crit-damage-multiplier.label: Crit Damage Multiplier
combat.added-attack.label: Added Attack
combat.added-defense.label: Added Defense
combat.added-immunity.label: Added Immunity
combat.no-monster-spawns.label: No Monster Spawns
combat.no-monster-spawns.tooltip: Removes all monsters from the current location.
skills.xp-multiplier.label: XP Multiplier
skills.farming-override.label: Farming Level Override
skills.mining-override.label: Mining Level Override
skills.foraging-override.label: Foraging Level Override
skills.fishing-override.label: Fishing Level Override
skills.combat-override.label: Combat Level Override
tools.tool-area-multiplier.label: Tool Area Multiplier
tools.tool-area-multiplier.tooltip: Multiply area affected by hoe/watering can. 1 = normal.
tools.no-tool-stamina.label: No Tool Stamina Cost
tools.infinite-water.label: Infinite Water
tools.one-hit-tools.label: One Hit Tools
tools.one-hit-tools.tooltip: Axe destroys trees/stumps in one hit. Pickaxe destroys rocks/boulders in one hit.
tools.instant-tool-upgrade.label: Instant Tool Upgrade
tools.instant-tool-upgrade.tooltip: Tool upgrades at the blacksmith complete instantly.
tools.free-crafting.label: Free Crafting
farming.crops-never-die.label: Crops Never Die
farming.crops-never-die.tooltip: Crops survive season changes and lack of water.
farming.forage-quality.label: Force Forage Quality
farming.grow-crops.label: Grow All Crops
farming.grow-crops.tooltip: Instantly grow all crops to harvestable state.
farming.grow-trees.label: Grow All Trees
farming.grow-trees.tooltip: Instantly grow all regular trees to full size.
farming.grow-fruit-trees.label: Grow All Fruit Trees
farming.grow-fruit-trees.tooltip: Instantly grow all fruit trees to full maturity.
farming.water-fields.label: Water All Fields
farming.water-fields.tooltip: Water all tilled fields on the farm.
farming.prevent-debris.label: Prevent Debris Spawn
farming.prevent-debris.tooltip: Stop weeds, stones, and twigs from spawning on the farm.
farming.soil-dont-decay.label: Tilled Soil Don't Decay
animals.max-happiness.label: Max Animal Happiness
animals.max-happiness.tooltip: All farm animals are always at max happiness.
animals.buy-matured.label: Buy Animals Fully Matured
animals.buy-matured.tooltip: Purchased animals are fully grown immediately.
animals.auto-pet.label: Auto-Pet Animals
animals.auto-pet.tooltip: Automatically pet all farm animals each day.
animals.auto-feed.label: Auto-Feed Animals
animals.auto-feed.tooltip: Automatically fill all feeding troughs with hay.
animals.produce-daily.label: Animals Produce Daily
animals.produce-daily.tooltip: All animals produce every day regardless of schedule.
animals.farm-hearts.label: Farm Animal Hearts
animals.farm-hearts.tooltip: -1=disabled, 0-10=override friendship hearts for all farm animals.
animals.pet-hearts.label: Pet Hearts
animals.infinite-hay.label: Infinite Hay
fishing.instant-bite.label: Instant Fish Bite
fishing.instant-bite.tooltip: Fish bite immediately when you cast.
fishing.instant-catch.label: Instant Catch
fishing.max-quality.label: Max Fish Quality
fishing.max-quality.tooltip: All caught fish are iridium quality.
fishing.always-treasure.label: Always Find Treasure
items.magnetic-multiplier.label: Magnetic Radius Multiplier
items.magnetic-bonus.label: Added Magnetic Radius
items.magnetic-bonus.tooltip: Flat bonus to pickup range in pixels. 128 = 2 tiles.
items.infinite-items.label: Infinite Items
items.infinite-items.tooltip: Items don't get consumed when used. (Experimental)
items.unlock-all-recipes.label: Unlock All Recipes
items.unlock-all-recipes.tooltip: Unlock all crafting and cooking recipes.
items.unlock-crafting.label: Unlock All Crafting Recipes
items.unlock-cooking.label: Unlock All Cooking Recipes
items.unlock-inventory.label: Unlock All Inventory Slots
economy.sell-price.label: Sell Price Multiplier
economy.buy-price.label: Buy Price Modifier
economy.free-shop.label: Free Shop Purchases
economy.free-shop.tooltip: All shop purchases are free (no gold cost).
economy.free-geodes.label: Free Geode Processing
economy.free-geodes.tooltip: Geode processing at Clint's is free (no 25g cost).
economy.add-money.label: Add Money
economy.add-money-slider.tooltip: Choose amount of gold to add.
economy.add-money-button.tooltip: Add the selected amount to your wallet and profit.
economy.add-qi-coins.label: Add Qi Coins
economy.add-qi-slider.tooltip: Choose amount of Qi Coins to add.
economy.add-qi-button.tooltip: Add the selected Qi Coins to your account.
buildings.instant-machines.label: Instant Machine Processing
buildings.instant-machines.tooltip: All machines produce output instantly (no processing time).
buildings.instant-build.label: Instant Build Construction
buildings.instant-build.tooltip: Buildings finish constructing instantly when placed.
buildings.instant-upgrade.label: Instant Build Upgrade
buildings.instant-house.label: Instant House Upgrade
buildings.instant-community.label: Instant Community Upgrade
buildings.instant-community.tooltip: Community upgrades (Pam's house, shortcuts) complete instantly.
buildings.free-construction.label: Free Building Construction
buildings.free-construction.tooltip: Buildings cost no gold or materials to construct.
world.freeze-time.label: Freeze Time
world.freeze-time-indoors.label: Freeze Time Indoors
world.freeze-time-indoors.tooltip: Time stops when you're inside buildings.
world.freeze-time-mines.label: Freeze Time in Mines
world.freeze-time-mines.tooltip: Time stops while inside mines, skull cavern, and volcano dungeon.
world.never-pass-out.label: Never Pass Out
world.never-pass-out.tooltip: Stay awake past 2am without passing out.
world.subtract-time.label: Subtract 10 Minutes
world.subtract-time.tooltip: Go back 10 minutes in game time.
world.subtract-time-button.tooltip: Subtract 10 minutes from the current time.
world.add-time.label: Add 10 Minutes
world.add-time-button.tooltip: Add 10 minutes to the current time.
world.set-time.label: Set Current Time
world.set-time-button.tooltip: Set the current game time to the selected value.
world.max-luck.label: Always Max Luck
world.max-luck.tooltip: Every day is the luckiest day possible.
world.weather.label: Weather Tomorrow
world.weather.tooltip: Override tomorrow's weather. No Override = game default.
world.bypass-friendship.label: Bypass Friendship Doors
world.bypass-friendship.tooltip: Bypass NPC bedroom doors that require 2+ hearts friendship.
world.bypass-time.label: Bypass Time Restrictions
world.bypass-time.tooltip: Enter buildings even when they're closed (shop hours).
world.bypass-festivals.label: Bypass Festival Closures
world.bypass-festivals.tooltip: Enter buildings during festivals when everything is normally closed.
world.bypass-conditional.label: Bypass Conditional Doors
world.bypass-conditional.tooltip: Bypass conditional doors that use Game State Queries.
world.bypass-special.label: Bypass Special Closures
world.bypass-special.tooltip: Bypass special closures like Pierre's Wednesday closure.
world.auto-accept-quests.label: Auto-Accept Quests
world.auto-accept-quests.tooltip: Automatically accept the daily quest from the Help Wanted board.
world.infinite-quest-time.label: Infinite Quest Time
world.infinite-quest-time.tooltip: Quest timers never expire. Quests won't fail from running out of time.
world.complete-bundles.label: Complete Community Bundle
world.complete-bundles.tooltip: Complete all community center bundles instantly.
world.complete-orders.label: Complete Special Orders
world.complete-orders.tooltip: Complete all active special orders instantly.
relationships.no-decay.label: No Friendship Decay
relationships.gifts-anytime.label: Give Gifts Anytime
relationships.gifts-anytime.tooltip: Bypass daily and weekly gift limits. Give unlimited gifts to NPCs.
warp.hint: Click a location to instantly warp there.
mining.ladder-chance.label: Force Ladder Chance
mining.ladder-chance.tooltip: Chance to force ladder spawn when breaking rocks. 0 = disabled, 100 = always spawn.
hud.joja-active: Joja route active - bundles not applicable!
hud.no-active-orders: No active special orders to complete!
hud.config-saved: Cheats saved to config! They will restore on next game launch.
